faqs.question: What types of AI Models do your tools use?
faqs.answer: Our tools use the latest AI LLM APIs provided by OpenAI and Anthropic. We also use open source models hosted on Together AI. For high-security applications we use open source models hosted on private cloud or on-premises servers.

faqs.question: How can I be sure my IP is protected?
faqs.answer: We take IP security very seriously and offer zero retention policies for customers that request it. No data is ever used for model training.

faqs.question: Where is your pricing information?
faqs.answer: It's coming soon, we are still in the early stages of product development so we haven't yet settled on our pricing. Please reach out and chat with us.
